AdditionalFields.Value: Cancer Evolution,Bioinformatics / Computational Biology / Systems Biology / Convergent Science,Data Science

Description: All Annual Meeting attendees are invited to participate in this special evening session hosted by Drs. Anna D. Barker and Jeffrey Townsend,  Co-Chairs of the AACR Cancer Evolution Working Group. The 2024 CEWG Town Hall will feature three presentations from experts in the cancer evolution community on the theme of "Is Cancer Evolution Key to Understanding and Strategically Applying the Multiple Cancer Early Detection (MECED) Assays?" followed by a panel discussion. The Town Hall also includes a Networking Reception at the beginning and conclusion of the session.
SearchResultBody: TM01. Is Cancer Evolution Key to Understanding and Strategically Applying the Multiple Cancer Early Detection (MECED) Assays?: A Cancer Evolution Working Group Town Hall Meeting
Title: Is Cancer Evolution Key to Understanding and Strategically Applying the Multiple Cancer Early Detection (MECED) Assays?: A Cancer Evolution Working Group Town Hall Meeting
